Hello ETHRome Hackathon!

This is a even newer version

What is Autark?

A CLI tool that prevents malicious frontend deployments by combining Safe multisig approvals with immutable ENS versioning.

Key Features:

  • Human verification checkpoints via Safe multisig
  • IPFS deployment with content addressing
  • Immutable ENS subdomains (v0, v1, v2...)
  • Git commit tracking for transparency
  • ENS NameWrapper fuse burning for permanence

Built with:

Storacha • ENS • Safe • Ethereum • IPFS

Deployed at:

Made with love at ETHRome 2025
